arabic_text: وَإِن مِّنكُمۡ إِلَّا وَارِدُهَاۚ كَانَ عَلَىٰ رَبِّكَ حَتۡمٗا مَّقۡضِيّٗا
translation: (71) And there is none of you except he will come to it.[823] This is upon your Lord an inevitability decreed.
footnotes: [823]- i.e., be exposed to it.  However, the people of Paradise will not be harmed thereby.
